ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: You are surely caught in contradictions.,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: surely you are at variance (about the Hereafter);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You are indeed in different opinions regarding this Qur’an.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely you are at variance with each other in what you say,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! ye, forsooth, are of various opinion (concerning the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: surely you are deeply at variance [as to what to believe] --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily ye are in a divided opinion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: indeed you are of different opinions!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly ye are in a doctrine discordant,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Certainly, you have different ideas (about Muhammad SAW and the Quran).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: surely, you are in different sayings,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You differ in what you say.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, you are in differing speech.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:8] indeed you, O people of Mecca, with regard to the matter of the Prophet (s) and the Qur’ān, are of differing opinions: some say [of the Prophet that he is] ‘a poet’, ‘a sorcerer’, or ‘a soothsayer’, and [of the Qur’ān, that it is] ‘poetry’, ‘sorcery’, or ‘soothsaying’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! Ye) people of Mecca, (forsooth, are of various opinion (concerning the Truth)) some of you believe in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an and some of you disbelieve in them.
